Name: DeerHunterX
About the game: GamePlay: Shoot a tone of deer, earn points, buy better guns to kill deer faster. Features: • Weapons: Snipers, assault rifles, and pistols • Deer: Kill deer for points • Points: Use points to buy weapons • PlayTime: Keeps tack of your playtime • KillCount: Keeps track of killed deer • Easy: Deer can't shoot back!
